DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : CHINA
DOC.TEXT: Enterprises Head for Foreign Stock_Exchanges : Five of 22 Chinese enterprises selected for listing on foreign stock_exchanges this year will go_to New York , with the bulk heading for Hong Kong , leaving London and other markets temporarily out_in the cold . The five , announced recently by the China Securities Regulatory Commission , are : China Eastern Airlines , China Southern Airlines , Huaneng International Power Development , Shandong Power_Plant and Tianjin Steel Tube .
